channel.title: CVE Feed for Codehaus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Codehaus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-1002200|2024-08-05T12:47:57.447Z -- codehaus -- plexus-archiver
item.description: plexus-archiver before 3.6.0 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in an archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
